meanings.definition: The quality or state of being curvilinear.
meanings.sent1: The curvilinearities of the road made it a scenic drive.
meanings.sent2: The artist used curvilinearities in the painting to create a sense of movement.
meanings.sent3: The curvilinearities of the river seemed to dance under the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts followed the curvilinearities of a winding path, never in a straight line.
meanings.sent5: The curvilinearities of the roller coaster track added excitement to the ride.

meanings.definition: A curving or bending line or shape.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with beautiful curvilinearities of flower beds.
meanings.sent2: The calligrapher's brush strokes formed elegant curvilinearities on the paper.
meanings.sent3: The curvilinearities of the maze puzzled the participants.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back in soft curvilinearities.
meanings.sent5: The curvilinearities of the sculpture captured the essence of grace and fluidity.
